mapper.select: SELECT parts_info.*, userOfSendbackConfirmedPerson.`name` AS sendbackConfirmedPersonName from parts_info LEFT JOIN user as userOfSendbackConfirmedPerson ON userOfSendbackConfirmedPerson.id = parts_info.sendback_confirmed_person LEFT JOIN repair_actual_info as rai ON rai.id = parts_info.repair_actual_info_id LEFT JOIN repair_record as rr ON rr.id = rai.repair_record_id WHERE rr.id = #{repairRecordId} -- * 配件寄回状态， -- * 1: 无需回寄，其他表示需要寄回 -- * 2：未寄回， -- * 3：已寄回（待售后确认） -- * 4：售后已确认 and parts_info.parts_status = '2'

SELECT m.order_num, userOfCustomerInMachine.`name` as machineCustomerName, parts_info.id as partsInfoId, parts_info.*, userOfSendbackConfirmedPerson.name as sendbackConfirmedPersonName, a.name as machineAgentName, m.facory_date, rai.issue_position as issuePositionList, userOfRepairChargePerson.`name` as repairChargePersonName, userOfRepairChargePerson.`phone` as repairChargePersonPhone, userOfCustomerInMachine.phone as machineCustomerPhone, userOfCustomerInMachine.agent as machineAgentId, -- 机器的客户的代理商的ID号 userOfCustomerInMachine.customer_company as machineCustomerCompanyId, -- 机器的客户的公司的ID号 a.phone as machineAgentPhone, m.machine_type,m.needle_num,m.head_num,m.head_distance,m.x_distance,m.y_distance, userOfCustomerInRepairRecord.`name` as repairRecordCustomerName, -- 客户方的维修联系人 userOfCustomerInRepairRecord.phone as customerPhoneInRepairRecord, userOfCustomerInRepairRecord.address as customerAddressInRepairRecord, rri.repair_title as repairRequestTitle, rri.content as repairRequestContent, rri.voice as repairRequestVoice, rri.pictures as repairRequestPictures, rai.issue_description as repairActualIssueDescription, rai.repair_method as repairActualMethod, rai.after_resolve_pictures as afterResolvePictures, rr.id as repairRecordId, rr.*, rcf.customer_mark as repairFeedbackCustomerMark, rcf.customer_suggestion as repairFeedbackCustomerSuggestion
from repair_record as rr LEFT JOIN machine as m ON m.nameplate = rr.machine_nameplate LEFT JOIN `user` as userOfCustomerInMachine ON userOfCustomerInMachine.id = m.customer LEFT JOIN agent as a ON a.id = userOfCustomerInMachine.agent LEFT JOIN repair_actual_info as rai ON rai.repair_record_id = rr.id -- LEFT JOIN issue_position_list as ipl ON ipl.id = rai.issue_position LEFT JOIN user as userOfRepairChargePerson ON userOfRepairChargePerson.id = rr.repair_charge_person LEFT JOIN user as userOfCustomerInRepairRecord ON userOfCustomerInRepairRecord.id = rr.customer LEFT JOIN repair_request_info as rri ON rri.id = rr.repair_request_info LEFT JOIN repair_customer_feedback as rcf ON rcf.id = rr.customer_feedback LEFT JOIN parts_info ON parts_info.repair_actual_info_id = rai.id LEFT JOIN user AS userOfSendbackConfirmedPerson ON userOfSendbackConfirmedPerson.id = parts_info.sendback_confirmed_person WHERE 1=1 -- 1: 无需回寄，其他表示需要寄回(具体 2：未寄回，3：已寄回（待确认），4：已确认) AND (parts_info.parts_status = '2' or parts_info.parts_status = '3') AND userOfCustomerInRepairRecord.`name` = #{userName}
